014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
017import java.util.Objects;
018import java.util.Set;
019
020public class DefaultAutoCloseableRegistry implements AutoCloseableRegistry {
021
022  // @GuardedBy("this")
023  private Set<AutoCloseable> closeables;
024
025  public DefaultAutoCloseableRegistry() {
026    super();
027  }
028
029  @Override // Cloneable
030  public DefaultAutoCloseableRegistry clone() {
031    final DefaultAutoCloseableRegistry dacr;
032    try {
033      dacr = (DefaultAutoCloseableRegistry)super.clone();
034    } catch (final CloneNotSupportedException e) {
035      throw new AssertionError(e.getMessage(), e);
036    }
037    dacr.closeables = null;
038    if (!this.register(dacr)) { // CRITICAL
039      throw new AssertionError();
040    }
041    return dacr;
042  }
043
044  @Override // AutoCloseableRegistry
045  public final void close() {
046    final Set<? extends AutoCloseable> closeables;
047    synchronized (this) {
048      closeables = this.closeables;
049      if (closeables == Set.<AutoCloseable>of()) {
050        // already closed
051        return;
052      }
053      this.closeables = Set.of();
054    }
055    if (closeables == null) {
056      // nothing to close
057      return;
058    }
059    RuntimeException re = null;
060    for (final AutoCloseable c : closeables) {
061      try {
062        c.close();
063      } catch (final RuntimeException e) {
064        if (re == null) {
065          re = e;
066        } else {
067          re.addSuppressed(e);
068        }
069      } catch (final Exception e) {
070        if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
071          Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
072        }
073        if (re == null) {
074          re = new BeanException(e.getMessage(), e);
075        } else {
076          re.addSuppressed(e);
077        }
078      }
079    }
080    if (re != null) {
081      throw re;
082    }
083  }
084
085  @Override // AutoCloseable
086  public final synchronized boolean closed() {
087    return this.closeables == Set.<AutoCloseable>of();
088  }
089
090  @Override // AutoCloseableRegistry
091  public final boolean register(final AutoCloseable closeable) {
092    if (Objects.requireNonNull(closeable, "closeable") == this) {
093      throw new IllegalArgumentException("closeable == this");
094    }
095    synchronized (this) {
096      if (this.closed()) {
097        return false;
098      } else if (this.closeables == null) {
099        this.closeables = new LinkedHashSet<>();
100      }
101      return this.closeables.add(closeable);
102    }
103  }
104
105  public final synchronized int size() {
106    return this.closeables == null ? 0 : this.closeables.size();
107  }
108
109}
